snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday’s selections include YouTube videos showing what your computer would look like if it were infected with various viruses, and...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday’s selections include YouTube videos showing what your computer would look like if it were infected with various viruses, and Telefónica to start selling a smartphone in Spain that runs on the Firefox mobile operating system.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Firefox Smartphone, and Virus Collector
